channel.title: Football on UN-aligned
channel.description: Recent content in Football on UN-aligned

item.title: Qatar 2022: A World Cup for Straight Men
item.author: mayabearyman
item.description: FIFA's male-dominated World Cup fails to represent its diverse fan base, but those fighting for equality will persevere.

item.title: Football: ‘Unsuitable for Women’ or were you just not brave enough to see the vision?
item.author: mayabearyman
item.description: Ask any British woman about sexism, and she’ll likely tell you a story of her experience, ask any British woman that played football, and she’ll probably tell you five.
